paper_abstract: ChemDoodle Web Components (abbreviated CWC, iChemLabs, LLC) is a light-weight (similar to 340 KB) JavaScript/HTML5 toolkit for chemical graphics, structure editing, interfaces, and informatics based on the proprietary ChemDoodle desktop software. The library uses 'canvas' and WebGL technologies and other HTML5 features to provide solutions for creating chemistry-related applications for the web on desktop and mobile platforms. CWC can serve a broad range of scientific disciplines including crystallography, materials science, organic and inorganic chemistry, biochemistry and chemical biology. CWC is freely available for in-house use and is open source (GPL v3) for all other uses.
paper_title: ChemDoodle Web Components: HTML5 toolkit for chemical graphics, interfaces, and informatics
